timeMachine.description: Save your database state before risky changes. One click to restore. Iterate without fear.

problemSolution.problemTitle: Development shouldn't feel like walking on eggshells.
problemSolution.problemLine1: You're about to run a migration, test a new feature, or debug a weird edge case.
problemSolution.problemLine3: So you make backups. Test in staging. Write defensive code.
problemSolution.solutionTitle: What if you could just... undo?
problemSolution.solutionLine2: Save state before risky changes. Restore in one click. Understand exactly what happened to any resource.

whyNow.cloakDescription: Open source. Self-hosted. Your data never leaves your machine. Built by developers who ship.

To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@cloakdb.com.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.content:
